name: Fire Shots 3D
description:
Fireshot 3D is a single tap addictive shooting game!

Tap to hold the trigger to break through multiple targets within seconds! Be careful of the obstacles! It’s not easy as it seems!

Features
- Simple and Fun
- 100 + Challenging Stages
- No Ads
- Infinite Bullets to hit targets!

Challenge your friends to see who can finish all the levels first!

More levels will be added with each update!
